summary: Two disparate young women working for a company that conducts euthanasia are dispatched to a remote estate to perform a custom assisted-suicide ritual, but unwittingly summon the wraiths of a Death Cult that once inhabited the property.
cast: Liv Collins|Sarah Power|Timothy Burd|Tony Burgess|Boyd Banks|Walter Borden|Barry Flatman|Ari Millen|Jason David Brown|Katherine Bell|Matt Griffin|Gwynda McKee|Griffin Jones-Burgess|Camille Jones-Burgess|Bruce McDonald|Barry More
title: The Hexecutioners
